scripts.build-electron: mkdir build/src && cp -r electron/. build/electron && cp -r src/shared/. build/src/shared

scriptsComments.* NOTE *: Developed for Mac only at this time. If it is desired to run on Win, need to add additional scripts for that.
scriptsComments.start: Runs development build on a local web server, frontend on 3000 (create-react-app) and proxied requests to 8080
scriptsComments.build: Runs production build, server runs and serves frontend from 8080
scriptsComments.server: Runs the node server, needs to be run before start script if in development mode
scriptsComments.start-electron: Runs electron locally, not a build. Must run start script in a separate terminal window before this.
scriptsComments.build-electron: Creates /electron and /src folders in /build to use for electron package script
scriptsComments.package: Package the code in the build/electron and build/src folders into executables (Mac and Win) outputted in /dist.
